about_the_game:
Feature:

  • Tactical Strategy and Flexible Controls

    Choose 4 soldiers to send into battle, each with unique skills and roles. With simple controls, you can quickly move soldiers and use micro-tactics to adjust strategies, making each battle deep and challenging.

  • Support and Defense Towers

    Players can deploy various support units, such as tank sentries, grenade sentries, and buff aura towers. These tower defense-style units can be upgraded during combat, allowing for flexible tactical adjustments to handle different enemies and situations.

  • Over 30 Types of Enemies and Epic Boss Battles

    Face off against over 30 types of monsters and take on epic, massive bosses, each with unique abilities and challenges.

  • Randomly Generated Maps

    Each game's map is randomly generated. Players can choose their own path, facing unknown enemies and challenges, ensuring that every adventure brings a new tactical experience.

  • Create Your Own Playstyle

    Through talent upgrades and relics, you can create unique combat styles, such as frost, fire, or HP reduction builds, adding even more variety to your tactical options.

In Iron Vulture, you will take on the role of a commander responsible for making critical decisions. Send your squad into the unknown, face powerful enemies, and navigate dangerous situations. Every choice and strategy will determine the fate of your squad! Are you ready to lead your soldiers on an expedition to an unknown continent?
detailed_description:

  • Tactical Strategy and Flexible Controls

    Choose 4 soldiers to send into battle, each with unique skills and roles. With simple controls, you can quickly move soldiers and use micro-tactics to adjust strategies, making each battle deep and challenging.

  • Support and Defense Towers

    Players can deploy various support units, such as tank sentries, grenade sentries, and buff aura towers. These tower defense-style units can be upgraded during combat, allowing for flexible tactical adjustments to handle different enemies and situations.

  • Over 30 Types of Enemies and Epic Boss Battles

    Face off against over 30 types of monsters and take on epic, massive bosses, each with unique abilities and challenges.

  • Randomly Generated Maps

    Each game's map is randomly generated. Players can choose their own path, facing unknown enemies and challenges, ensuring that every adventure brings a new tactical experience.

  • Create Your Own Playstyle

    Through talent upgrades and relics, you can create unique combat styles, such as frost, fire, or HP reduction builds, adding even more variety to your tactical options.

In Iron Vulture, you will take on the role of a commander responsible for making critical decisions. Send your squad into the unknown, face powerful enemies, and navigate dangerous situations. Every choice and strategy will determine the fate of your squad! Are you ready to lead your soldiers on an expedition to an unknown continent?

name: Iron Vulture

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+

short_description: Iron Vulture is a squad-based tactical Roguelite game where players command a team of elite soldiers in a fight for survival. Choose 4 soldiers, each with unique abilities and roles, and dive into procedurally generated maps filled with strategic challenges and fast-paced combat.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian
